MS MCQs

    Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) - What is SRE and why does it matter?

    »

    1. Which property of a service, system or product does SRE primarily focus on?

      Security

      Cost to run

      Reliability

      Maintainability


    2. For almost all services, systems and products, what level of reliability does an SRE strive for?

      100\% is the goal

      It should be as reliable as possible

      A specific level identified as appropriate by the key stakeholders
